byline.original: By PUI-WING TAM and MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

abstract: Car-hailing app Uber is preparing new fund-raising that could total $1.5 billion, valuing firm at $50 billion; new capital is strategic with plan for partnerships.
lead_paragraph: The new capital will not be used primarily for expansion purposes, unlike Uber’s previous financing rounds — instead, the funding is strategic, with an eye on partnerships.

headline.main: Uber Fund-Raising Points to $50 Billion Valuation
headline.print_headline: Uber Fund-Raising Points to $50 Billion Valuation

snippet: The new capital will not be used primarily for expansion purposes, unlike Uber’s previous financing rounds — instead, the funding is strategic, with an eye on partnerships.
